word: Let none venture into sin as he did, in the hope that they too may recover themselves.  Sin can be indulged only at the peril of infinite loss.  But none who have fallen need give themselves up to despair.  Aged men, once honored of God, may have defiled their souls, sacrificing virtue on the altar of lust; but there is still hope for them if they repent, forsake sin, and turn to God.
